thread.title: Wellbeing package at So Spa with L’occitane
thread.title_full: Wellbeing package at So Spa with L’occitane

author: Sirisawan
title: Wellbeing package at So Spa with L’occitane
text:
Wellbeing package at So Spa with L’occitane Wellbeing package at So Spa with L’occitane Written by Sirisawan | August 10, 2015 | 0 | 
Throughout September, Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort invites you to indulge yourself with a Thai-style retreat with Wellbeing Package at So SPA with L’Occitane. Start with a relaxing 30-minute Jacuzzi Bath to improve blood circulation, followed by a 60-minute Body Scrub to help moisturize your skin. The Wellbeing Package ends with a 60-minute Relaxing Aromachologies to leave you feeling rejuvenated. Special prices at THB 3,500 nett for single and THB 6,500 nett for couple. For more information and reservation, please call +66 (0) 75 627 800 or write us an email to H6184-TH@SOFITEL.COM
